summary:
Hello ladies and gentlemen.

This is a small mod make Dovahkin's dialogue with the NPC's who live Tel Mithryn change so it's better then the original.
descriptionHtml:
Hello ladies and gentlemen.
This is a small mod make Dovahkin's dialogue with the NPC's who live Tel Mithryn change so it's better then the original.

When talking to neloth and everyone who lives in Tel Mithryn the player dialogue is changed so that it a lot more immersive.Â 

1) Extract the zip to a temporary location.2) Go into the extracted folder drag the Tel Mithryn quests dialogue redone.esp into local disk c/ program Files x86/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data then place here.Or where ever you keep your data folder.Thank you and enjoy.
author: Cutesie
